title: No-bake Oreo Truffles
directions: Crush your cookies in a food processor or by hand. Leave a little for decoration.
Place your crushed Oreos into a bowl, add cream cheese and mix well.
Wet your hands and roll out same size balls and place them onto a plate or board.
Place the Oreo balls into the freezer for 15-20 min to set.

Melt your white chocolate in 30 second breaks and then dip each Oreo truffle ball into the white chocolate so its covered. Place back onto your sheet. Repeat with all of them. Sprinkle some crushed Oreo cookies on top and drizzle over with some melted dark chocolate over the truffles.
Place in a freezer or fridge until set. Enjoy within 3-4 days, if they can last that long!
ingredients: 1 cups OR 150-200 gr of white chocolate
1/4 or 40 gr of dark chocolate ( optional, used as decoration)
